com.leaf.clips.model.dataaccess.service

Class BuildingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leaf.clips.model.dataaccess.service.BuildingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseService

    public class BuildingService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseService
    Since:
    0.00 Classe che rappresenta il layer Service tra gli oggetti BuildingMap e gli oggetti DAO corrispettivi
